extendedInfo.description: This App represents the UK & Ireland SAP User Group, and in particular for its launch, the 2012 User Group Conference held in Manchester on the 18th to the 20th November. This app aims to be a digital interactive handbook for all SAP User Group Events. Each event represents the world of SAP, its partners and its users. Giving unparalleled networking opportunities and educational content. Content is delivered in the forms of SAP, SAP customer and SAP Partner speaker sessions, Workshops, Keynotes, all of which are detailed and timetabled in the app. The app is not only a guide to this comprehensive view of SAP but a valuable tool to network with full social media integration. The app will evolve and develop along with our business to include SIG (Special interest group) meetings and offer portable membership accesses, allowing users to refer to content and book onto sessions on the go.

reviews.title: Great stuff!
reviews.comment: Last years conference was definitely enhanced by ther mobile app, and the latest version looks like it\'s going to be used throughout ther year too! Awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on nexus 7
reviews.comment: Crashes when I try to login to my account. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Rick Atkinson

reviews.title: Rubbish.
reviews.comment: Crashes every time I try to use it. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User
